tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE virtual_events (
  event_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  event_name VARCHAR(255),
  event_date DATE,
  event_description TEXT,
  event_type VARCHAR(50)
)

CREATE TABLE participants (
    participant_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    participant_name VARCHAR(255),
    participant_email VARCHAR(255),
    event_id INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (event_id) REFERENCES virtual_events(event_id)
);

CREATE TABLE registrations (
  registration_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  event_id INT,
  participant_id INT,
  registration_date TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  CONSTRAINT fk_event FOREIGN KEY (event_id) REFERENCES events(event_id),
  CONSTRAINT fk_participant FOREIGN KEY (participant_id) REFERENCES participants(participant_id)
);

CREATE TABLE event_attendees (
    attendee_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    attendee_name VARCHAR(255),
    event_id INT,
    registration_date DATE,
    FOREIGN KEY (event_id) REFERENCES virtual_events(event_id)
);

CREATE TABLE workshop_attendees (
    attendee_id INT,
    workshop_id INT,
    attendance_date DATE,
    FOREIGN KEY (attendee_id) REFERENCES event_attendees(attendee_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (workshop_id) REFERENCES workshops(workshop_id)
);

CREATE TABLE event_feedback (
    feedback_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    event_id INT,
    attendee_id INT,
    feedback_text TEXT,
    rating INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (event_id) REFERENCES virtual_events(event_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (attendee_id) REFERENCES event_attendees(attendee_id)
);
